text: Barranquilla () is a city and municipality in northern Colombia. It is the capital of the Atlántico Department. With a population of 1,885,500 (2011), it is Colombia's fourth largest city after Bogotá, Medellín and Cali. ==References== Category:Cities in Colombia Category:Capitals of Colombian departments Category:1813 establishments Category:19th-century establishments in Colombia Category:1810s establishments in South America Category:Atlántico Department
title: Barranquilla
